A film I'd like to see, but you haven't convinced me of the value of PanScan.
http://www.answers.com/topic/pan-and-scan

This is one movie that sorely needs it. I have no idea why the height of the movie as shown on the dvd is so disconcerting to view as compared to normal viewing. I can only say that the improvement with this effort at panscan received unanimous support around our HQ here with no one wanting the other format instead for this movie. Its also quite rich a picture by the way, as this effort turned out real nice on the eye, I submit.

Very well written review, I am looking forward to watching the move and seeing how much I agree. ;-)
